QuestData.Title: A Show of Strength
QuestData.Description: Preparations for war are underway in the vrykul village of Voldrune to the southeast. Voldrune's thane cannot field a large army, but with our forces spread thin, we are still at risk.$B$BWe cannot risk giving the thane and his men an opportunity to attack, so we must take the battle to them. If you are truly a $c of the Horde, you will relish the chance to demonstrate our strength.$B$BCut down the huscarls and prove to this Dragonflayer clan that the Horde is not to be trifled with!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Dragonflayer Huscarls and return to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done exactly as I asked. We've got the Dragonflayers on the defensive and it'll soon be time to deal with their leader.
